items.q: What is the closest planet to the Sun?
items.explanation: Mercury is the innermost planet of the solar system.
Light is millions of times faster than sound in air.
Botanically, a tomato is a fruit because it has seeds.

items.q: What forms when water droplets in clouds merge and grow?
items.explanation: Rain falls when the droplets get too heavy for updrafts.

items.q: Name the object that orbits Earth.
items.explanation: The Moon is Earth's only natural satellite.

items.q: What is the process of a liquid turning into a gas?
items.explanation: This happens when the liquid absorbs enough heat.

items.q: What do bees collect to make honey?
What type of animal is a frog?
items.explanation: Frogs live on both land and water.
Ears capture sound waves and send them to the brain.

items.q: What part of the body pumps blood?
items.explanation: The heart acts as a pump for the circulatory system.
